body.p: Making sure the audience is engaged in your presentation is essential. This includes eliminating distracting elements such as technology issues and maintaining an engaging and captivating presentation. Your audience can be anyone from the Virginia Tech community, so making a connection to Hokies is always a good idea. Speaking or performing in front of crowds big and small can be daunting, but the people attending your event is there for a reason. They most likely want to be there. It is okay to talk with your audience! Engaging with your audience is always a good idea.
